price: Na tunawajua walio tangulia katika nyinyi, na tunawajua waliotaakhari.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ
footnotes: Na kila mmoja wenu ana muda wake alio pimiwa. Sisi ndio tunao ujua. Tunawajua walio tangulia kwa kufa na kuwa hai, na pia wanao taakhari.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'taqdimīna minkum walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'takhirīna
